jol.core
Class Clock

java.lang.Object
  jol.types.table.Table
      jol.types.table.RefTable
          jol.types.table.ObjectTable
              jol.core.Clock
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Table>
public class Clock
extends ObjectTable

The system clock. A single clock tick represents a full fixpoint iteration of all programs currently installed in the Runtime.

          An enumeration of all clock table fields.
